mapper.select: select userByProject.id,userByProject.userName,userByProject.projectId,userByProject.projectName,sum(tzr.result) as score from tiz_zentao_result tzr, ( select DISTINCT tu.id as id,tu.user_name as userName,zp.id as projectId,zp.`name` as projectName from zt_project zp,zt_action za join tiz_zentao_integral_user tziu on tziu.account = za.actor join tik_user tu on tziu.user_id = tu.id where zp.id = za.project and (zp.id=#{projectId}) and za.objectType = 'task' ) as userByProject where userByProject.id = tzr.user_id and DATE_SUB( CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY )<= date( tzr.create_time ) group by userByProject.id order by projectId
